verses.verse: וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become אִם־ <WH518> shall be if שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <WH8085> And it shall come to pass if thou shalt hearken תִּשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> diligently בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <WH8104> to observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> [and] to do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <WH4687> all his commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee this day וּנְתָ֨נְךָ֜ <WH5414> will set יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> thee on high עַ֖ל <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> above all nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וּבָ֧אוּ <WH935> shall come עָלֶ֛יךָ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַבְּרָכ֥וֹת <WH1293> And all these blessings הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these וְהִשִּׂיגֻ֑ךָ <WH5381> on thee and overtake כִּ֣י <WH3588> if תִשְׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> thee if thou shalt hearken בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> unto the voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you in בָּעִ֑יר <WH5892> [shalt] thou [be] in the city וּבָר֥וּךְ <WH1288> and blessed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you in בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> [shalt] thou [be] in the field

בָּר֧וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed פְּרִֽי־ <WH6529> [shall be] the fruit בִטְנְךָ֛ <WH990> of thy body וּפְרִ֥י <WH6529> and the fruit אַדְמָתְךָ֖ <WH127> of thy ground וּפְרִ֣י <WH6529> and the fruit בְהֶמְתֶּ֑ךָ <WH929> of thy cattle שְׁגַ֥ר <WH7698> the increase אֲלָפֶ֖יךָ <WH504> of thy kine וְעַשְׁתְּר֥וֹת <WH6251> and the flocks צֹאנֶֽךָ׃ <WH6629> of thy sheep
בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed טַנְאֲךָ֖ <WH2935> [shall be] thy basket וּמִשְׁאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH4863> and thy store

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you בְּבֹאֶ֑ךָ <WH935> [shalt] thou [be] when thou comest in וּבָר֥וּךְ <WH1288> and blessed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you בְּצֵאתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3318> [shalt] thou [be] when thou goest out

יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> shall cause יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH341> thine enemies הַקָּמִ֣ים <WH6965> that rise up עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> against נִגָּפִ֖ים <WH5062> against thee to be smitten לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> before thy face בְּדֶ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> way אֶחָד֙ <WH259> against thee one יֵצְא֣וּ <WH3318> they shall come out אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> against וּבְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> thee seven דְרָכִ֖ים <WH1870> ways יָנ֥וּסוּ <WH5127> and flee לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> before

יְצַ֨ו <WH6680> shall command יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> for אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּרָכָ֔ה <WH1293> the blessing בַּאֲסָמֶ֕יךָ <WH618> upon thee in thy storehouses וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH4916> and in all that thou settest יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> thine hand וּבֵ֣רַכְךָ֔ <WH1288> unto and he shall bless בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> thee in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָֽךְ׃

יְקִֽימְךָ֨ <WH6965> shall establish יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <WH5971> people קָד֔וֹשׁ <WH6918> thee an holy כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> to himself נִֽשְׁבַּֽע־ <WH7650> unto himself as he hath sworn לָ֑ךְ כִּ֣י <WH3588> if תִשְׁמֹ֗ר <WH8104> unto thee if thou shalt keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹת֙ <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <WH1980> and walk בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃ <WH1870> in his ways

וְרָאוּ֙ <WH7200> shall see כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> And all people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כִּ֛י <WH3588> by שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> by the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD נִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> that thou art called עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> and they וְיָֽרְא֖וּ <WH3372> and they shall be afraid מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> at

וְהוֹתִרְךָ֤ <WH3498> shall make thee plenteous יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD לְטוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> in goods בִּפְרִ֧י <WH6529> in the fruit בִטְנְךָ֛ <WH990> of thy body וּבִפְרִ֥י <WH6529> and in the fruit בְהַמְתְּךָ֖ <WH929> of thy cattle וּבִפְרִ֣י <WH6529> and in the fruit אַדְמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH127> of thy ground עַ֚ל <WH5921> in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> unto thy fathers לָ֥תֶת <WH5414> to give לָֽךְ׃

יִפְתַּ֣ח <WH6605> shall open יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD לְ֠ךָ אֶת־ <WH853> אוֹצָר֨וֹ <WH214> treasure הַטּ֜וֹב <WH2896> unto thee his good אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> the heaven לָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> to give מְטַֽר־ <WH4306> the rain אַרְצְךָ֙ <WH776> unto thy land בְּעִתּ֔וֹ <WH6256> in his season וּלְבָרֵ֕ךְ <WH1288> and to bless אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> all the work יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> of thine hand וְהִלְוִ֙יתָ֙ <WH3867> and thou shalt lend גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> unto many וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִלְוֶֽה׃ <WH3867> and thou shalt not borrow

וּנְתָֽנְךָ֨ <WH5414> shall make יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD לְרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> thee the head וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not לְזָנָ֔ב <WH2180> and not the tail וְהָיִ֙יתָ֙ <WH1961> become רַ֣ק <WH7535> but לְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and thou shalt be above only וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become לְמָ֑טָּה <WH4295> and thou shalt not be beneath כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if תִשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> if that thou hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to מִצְוֹ֣ת ׀ <WH4687> unto the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֧י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> thee this day לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> to observe וְלַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> and to do

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תָס֗וּר <WH5493> And thou shalt not go aside מִכָּל־ <WH3605> any הַדְּבָרִים֙ <WH1697> from any of the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> thee this day יָמִ֣ין <WH3225> [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> or [to] the left לָלֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> to go אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other לְעָבְדָֽם׃ <WH5647> to serve ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come אִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> But it shall come to pass if thou wilt not hearken בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <WH8104> to observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> to do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתָ֣יו <WH4687> all his commandments וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <WH2708> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee this day וּבָ֧אוּ <WH935> shall come עָלֶ֛יךָ <WH5921> that כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקְּלָל֥וֹת <WH7045> that all these curses הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these וְהִשִּׂיגֽוּךָ׃ <WH5381> upon thee and overtake
אָר֥וּר <WH779> Cursed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you in בָּעִ֑יר <WH5892> [shalt] thou [be] in the city וְאָר֥וּר <WH779> and cursed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you in בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> [shalt] thou [be] in the field
אָר֥וּר <WH779> Cursed טַנְאֲךָ֖ <WH2935> [shall be] thy basket וּמִשְׁאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH4863> and thy store

אָר֥וּר <WH779> Cursed פְּרִֽי־ <WH6529> [shall be] the fruit בִטְנְךָ֖ <WH990> of thy body וּפְרִ֣י <WH6529> and the fruit אַדְמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH127> of thy land שְׁגַ֥ר <WH7698> the increase אֲלָפֶ֖יךָ <WH504> of thy kine וְעַשְׁתְּר֥וֹת <WH6251> and the flocks צֹאנֶֽךָ׃ <WH6629> of thy sheep

אָר֥וּר <WH779> Cursed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you בְּבֹאֶ֑ךָ <WH935> [shalt] thou [be] when thou comest in וְאָר֥וּר <WH779> and cursed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you בְּצֵאתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3318> [shalt] thou [be] when thou goest out

יְשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> shall send יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD בְּ֠ךָ אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּאֵרָ֤ה <WH3994> upon thee cursing אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּהוּמָה֙ <WH4103> vexation וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּגְעֶ֔רֶת <WH4045> and rebuke בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH4916> in all that thou settest יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> thine hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> because תַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> unto for to do עַ֣ד <WH5704> until הִשָּֽׁמֶדְךָ֤ <WH8045> until thou be destroyed וְעַד־ <WH5704> and until אֲבָדְךָ֙ <WH6> and until thou perish מַהֵ֔ר <WH4118> quickly מִפְּנֵ֛י <WH6440> because רֹ֥עַ <WH7455> of the wickedness מַֽעֲלָלֶ֖יךָ <WH4611> of thy doings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> because עֲזַבְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH5800> whereby thou hast forsaken

יַדְבֵּ֧ק <WH1692> cleave יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD בְּךָ֖ אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> shall make the pestilence עַ֚ד <WH5704> until כַּלֹּת֣וֹ <WH3615> unto thee until he have consumed אֹֽתְךָ֔ <WH853> מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> from הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> thee from off the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בָא־ <WH935> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess

יַכְּכָ֣ה <WH5221> shall smite יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> The LORD בַּשַּׁחֶ֨פֶת <WH7829> thee with a consumption וּבַקַּדַּ֜חַת <WH6920> and with a fever וּבַדַּלֶּ֗קֶת <WH1816> and with an inflammation וּבַֽחַרְחֻר֙ <WH2746> and with an extreme burning וּבַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> and with the sword וּבַשִּׁדָּפ֖וֹן <WH7711> and with blasting וּבַיֵּרָק֑וֹן <WH3420> and with mildew וּרְדָפ֖וּךָ <WH7291> and they shall pursue עַ֥ד <WH5704> until אָבְדֶֽךָ׃ <WH6> thee until thou perish

וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become שָׁמֶ֛יךָ <WH8064> And thy heaven אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is over רֹאשְׁךָ֖ <WH7218> that [is] over thy head נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> shall be brass וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> and the earth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תַּחְתֶּ֖יךָ <WH8478> is under בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <WH1270> that is under thee [shall be] iron

יִתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> shall make יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מְטַ֥ר <WH4306> the rain אַרְצְךָ֖ <WH776> of thy land אָבָ֣ק <WH80> powder וְעָפָ֑ר <WH6083> and dust מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> from heaven יֵרֵ֣ד <WH3381> shall it come down עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> on עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הִשָּׁמְדָֽךְ׃ <WH8045> upon thee until thou be destroyed

יִתֶּנְךָ֨ <WH5414> shall cause יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD נִגָּף֮ <WH5062> thee to be smitten לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֹיְבֶיךָ֒ <WH341> thine enemies בְּדֶ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> way אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one תֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> thou shalt go out אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> against וּבְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> seven דְרָכִ֖ים <WH1870> ways תָּנ֣וּס <WH5127> against them and flee לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before וְהָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> become לְזַעֲוָ֔ה <WH2189> them and shalt be removed לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <WH4467> into all the kingdoms הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become נִבְלָֽתְךָ֙ <WH5038> And thy carcase לְמַאֲכָ֔ל <WH3978> shall be meat לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all ע֥וֹף <WH5775> unto all fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of the air וּלְבֶהֱמַ֣ת <WH929> and unto the beasts הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> and there מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and no man shall fray [them] away

יַכְּכָ֨ה <WH5221> will smite יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> The LORD בִּשְׁחִ֤ין <WH7822> thee with the botch מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt [וּבָעֳפָלִים כ] (וּבַטְּחֹרִ֔ים <WH6076> stronghold ק) וּבַגָּרָ֖ב <WH1618> and with the scab וּבֶחָ֑רֶס <WH2775> and with the itch אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not תוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> whereof thou canst לְהֵרָפֵֽא׃ <WH7495> not be healed

יַכְּכָ֣ה <WH5221> shall smite יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD בְּשִׁגָּע֖וֹן <WH7697> thee with madness וּבְעִוָּר֑וֹן <WH5788> and blindness וּבְתִמְה֖וֹן <WH8541> and astonishment לֵבָֽב׃ <WH3824> of heart

וְהָיִ֜יתָ <WH1961> become מְמַשֵּׁ֣שׁ <WH4959> And thou shalt grope בַּֽצָּהֳרַ֗יִם <WH6672> at noonday כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יְמַשֵּׁ֤שׁ <WH4959> gropeth הָעִוֵּר֙ <WH5787> as the blind בָּאֲפֵלָ֔ה <WH653> in darkness וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and you will not תַצְלִ֖יחַ <WH6743> and thou shalt not prosper אֶת־ <WH853> דְּרָכֶ֑יךָ <WH1870> in thy ways וְהָיִ֜יתָ <WH1961> become אַ֣ךְ <WH389> shall only עָשׁ֧וּק <WH6231> and thou shalt be only oppressed וְגָז֛וּל <WH1497> and spoiled כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> evermore וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> none מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> and no man shall save

אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> a wife תְאָרֵ֗שׂ <WH781> Thou shalt betroth וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man אַחֵר֙ <WH312> and another [יִשְׁגָּלֶנָּה כ] (יִשְׁכָּבֶ֔נָּה <WH7693> lie with ק) בַּ֥יִת <WH1004> an house תִּבְנֶ֖ה <WH1129> with her thou shalt build וְלֹא־ <WH3808> you will not תֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> and thou shalt not dwell בּ֑וֹ כֶּ֥רֶם <WH3754> a vineyard תִּטַּ֖ע <WH5193> therein thou shalt plant וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תְחַלְּלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH2490> and shalt not gather the grapes

שׁוֹרְךָ֞ <WH7794> Thine ox טָב֣וּחַ <WH2873> [shall be] slain לְעֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> before thine eyes וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תֹאכַל֮ <WH398> and thou shalt not eat מִמֶּנּוּ֒ <WH4480> of it חֲמֹֽרְךָ֙ <WH2543> thereof thine ass גָּז֣וּל <WH1497> [shall be] violently taken away מִלְּפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> from before thy face וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> and shall not be restored לָ֑ךְ צֹֽאנְךָ֙ <WH6629> to thee thy sheep נְתֻנ֣וֹת <WH5414> [shall be] given לְאֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> unto thine enemies וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> will have לְךָ֖ מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> and thou shalt have none to rescue

בָּנֶ֨יךָ <WH1121> Thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֜יךָ <WH1323> and thy daughters נְתֻנִ֨ים <WH5414> [shall be] given לְעַ֤ם <WH5971> people אַחֵר֙ <WH312> unto another וְעֵינֶ֣יךָ <WH5869> and thine eyes רֹא֔וֹת <WH7200> shall look וְכָל֥וֹת <WH3616> and fail אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> [with longing] for them all the day וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there לְאֵ֖ל <WH410> long and [there shall be] no might יָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> in thine hand

פְּרִ֤י <WH6529> The fruit אַדְמָֽתְךָ֙ <WH127> of thy land וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יְגִ֣יעֲךָ֔ <WH3018> and all thy labours יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> not eat up עַ֖ם <WH5971> shall a nation אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָדָ֑עְתָּ <WH3045> which thou knowest וְהָיִ֗יתָ <WH1961> become רַ֛ק <WH7535> but עָשׁ֥וּק <WH6231> and thou shalt be only oppressed וְרָצ֖וּץ <WH7533> and crushed כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> alway

וְהָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> become מְשֻׁגָּ֑ע <WH7696> So that thou shalt be mad מִמַּרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> for the sight עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> of thine eyes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> of what תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> which thou shalt see

יַכְּכָ֨ה <WH5221> shall smite יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> The LORD בִּשְׁחִ֣ין <WH7822> botch רָ֗ע <WH7451> with a sore עַל־ <WH5921> on הַבִּרְכַּ֙יִם֙ <WH1290> thee in the knees וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַשֹּׁקַ֔יִם <WH7785> and in the legs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not תוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> that cannot לְהֵרָפֵ֑א <WH7495> be healed מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> from the sole רַגְלְךָ֖ <WH7272> of thy foot וְעַ֥ד <WH5704> against קָדְקֳדֶֽךָ׃ <WH6936> unto the top of thy head

יוֹלֵ֨ךְ <WH1980> will bring יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> The LORD אֹֽתְךָ֗ <WH853> וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> מַלְכְּךָ֙ <WH4428> thee and thy king אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom תָּקִ֣ים <WH6965> which thou shalt set עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> over אֶל־ <WH413> to גּ֕וֹי <WH1471> over thee unto a nation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> neither יָדַ֖עְתָּ <WH3045> have known אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you וַאֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH1> which neither thou nor thy fathers וְעָבַ֥דְתָּ <WH5647> and there shalt thou serve שָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> and there אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> wood וָאָֽבֶן׃ <WH68> and stone

וְהָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> shall become לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH8047> And thou shalt become an astonishment לְמָשָׁ֖ל <WH4912> a proverb וְלִשְׁנִינָ֑ה <WH8148> and a byword בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> among all nations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יְנַהֶגְךָ֥ <WH5090> shall lead יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> whither the LORD שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it

זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> seed רַ֖ב <WH7227> much תּוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> out הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> into the field וּמְעַ֣ט <WH4592> [but] little תֶּאֱסֹ֔ף <WH622> in כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יַחְסְלֶ֖נּוּ <WH2628> shall consume הָאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH697> for the locust

כְּרָמִ֥ים <WH3754> vineyards תִּטַּ֖ע <WH5193> Thou shalt plant וְעָבָ֑דְתָּ <WH5647> and dress וְיַ֤יִן <WH3196> [of] the wine לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will neither תִשְׁתֶּה֙ <WH8354> [them] but shalt neither drink וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תֶאֱגֹ֔ר <WH103> nor gather כִּ֥י <WH3588> for תֹאכְלֶ֖נּוּ <WH398> shall eat הַתֹּלָֽעַת׃ <WH8438> [the grapes] for the worms

זֵיתִ֛ים <WH2132> Thou shalt have olive trees יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> shall have לְךָ֖ בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout גְּבוּלֶ֑ךָ <WH1366> throughout all thy coasts וְשֶׁ֙מֶן֙ <WH8081> [thyself] with the oil לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תָס֔וּךְ <WH5480> but thou shalt not anoint כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יִשַּׁ֖ל <WH5394> shall cast זֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH2132> for thine olive

בָּנִ֥ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנ֖וֹת <WH1323> and daughters תּוֹלִ֑יד <WH3205> Thou shalt beget וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become לָ֔ךְ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> will go בַּשֶּֽׁבִי׃ <WH7628> into captivity
כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֵצְךָ֖ <WH6086> All thy trees וּפְרִ֣י <WH6529> and fruit אַדְמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH127> of thy land יְיָרֵ֖שׁ <WH3423> consume הַצְּלָצַֽל׃ <WH6767> shall the locust

הַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> The stranger אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּקִרְבְּךָ֔ <WH7130> that [is] within יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> thee shall get up עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> above מַ֣עְלָה <WH4605> above thee very מָּ֑עְלָה <WH4605> high וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you תֵרֵ֖ד <WH3381> and thou shalt come down מַ֥טָּה <WH4295> very מָּֽטָּה׃ <WH4295> low

ה֣וּא <WH1931> He יַלְוְךָ֔ <WH3867> He shall lend וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תַלְוֶ֑נּוּ <WH3867> to thee and thou shalt not lend ה֚וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לְרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> to him he shall be the head וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְזָנָֽב׃ <WH2180> and thou shalt be the tail

וּבָ֨אוּ <WH935> shall come עָלֶ֜יךָ <WH5921> So כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקְּלָל֣וֹת <WH7045> Moreover all these curses הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these וּרְדָפ֙וּךָ֙ <WH7291> upon thee and shall pursue וְהִשִּׂיג֔וּךָ <WH5381> thee and overtake עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הִשָּֽׁמְדָ֑ךְ <WH8045> thee till thou be destroyed כִּי־ <WH3588> because לֹ֣א <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <WH8085> because thou hearkenedst בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> not unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֛ר <WH8104> to keep מִצְוֹתָ֥יו <WH4687> his commandments וְחֻקֹּתָ֖יו <WH2708> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוָּֽךְ׃ <WH6680> which he commanded

וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> shall become בְךָ֔ לְא֖וֹת <WH226> And they shall be upon thee for a sign וּלְמוֹפֵ֑ת <WH4159> and for a wonder וּֽבְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> and upon thy seed עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

תַּ֗חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> did not עָבַ֙דְתָּ֙ <WH5647> Because thou servedst אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> not the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּשִׂמְחָ֖ה <WH8057> with joyfulness וּבְט֣וּב <WH2898> and with gladness לֵבָ֑ב <WH3824> of heart מֵרֹ֖ב <WH7230> for the abundance כֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> of all

וְעָבַדְתָּ֣ <WH5647> Therefore shalt thou serve אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבֶ֗יךָ <WH341> thine enemies אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom יְשַׁלְּחֶ֤נּוּ <WH7971> shall send יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD בָּ֔ךְ בְּרָעָ֧ב <WH7458> against thee in hunger וּבְצָמָ֛א <WH6772> and in thirst וּבְעֵירֹ֖ם <WH5903> and in nakedness וּבְחֹ֣סֶר <WH2640> and in want כֹּ֑ל <WH3605> of all וְנָתַ֞ן <WH5414> of all [things] and he shall put עֹ֤ל <WH5923> a yoke בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> of iron עַל־ <WH5921> on צַוָּארֶ֔ךָ <WH6677> upon thy neck עַ֥ד <WH5704> until הִשְׁמִיד֖וֹ <WH8045> until he have destroyed אֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH853>

יִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> shall bring יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> The LORD עָלֶ֨יךָ <WH5921> against גּ֤וֹי <WH1471> a nation מֵרָחוֹק֙ <WH7350> against thee from far מִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> from the end הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose יִדְאֶ֖ה <WH1675> flieth הַנָּ֑שֶׁר <WH5404> [as swift] as the eagle גּ֕וֹי <WH1471> a nation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> thou shalt not understand לְשֹׁנֽוֹ׃ <WH3956> whose tongue

גּ֖וֹי <WH1471> A nation עַ֣ז <WH5794> of fierce פָּנִ֑ים <WH6440> countenance אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> no יִשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> which shall not regard פָנִים֙ <WH6440> the person לְזָקֵ֔ן <WH2205> of the old וְנַ֖עַר <WH5288> to the young לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יָחֹֽן׃ <WH2603> nor shew favour

וְ֠אָכַל <WH398> And he shall eat פְּרִ֨י <WH6529> the fruit בְהֶמְתְּךָ֥ <WH929> of thy cattle וּפְרִֽי־ <WH6529> and the fruit אַדְמָתְךָ֮ <WH127> of thy land עַ֣ד <WH5704> until הִשָּֽׁמְדָךְ֒ <WH8045> until thou be destroyed אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יַשְׁאִ֜יר <WH7604> which [also] shall not leave לְךָ֗ דָּגָן֙ <WH1715> thee [either] corn תִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> wine וְיִצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> or oil שְׁגַ֥ר <WH7698> [or] the increase אֲלָפֶ֖יךָ <WH504> of thy kine וְעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת <WH6251> or flocks צֹאנֶ֑ךָ <WH6629> of thy sheep עַ֥ד <WH5704> until הַאֲבִיד֖וֹ <WH6> until he have destroyed אֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH853>

וְהֵצַ֨ר <WH6887> And he shall besiege לְךָ֜ בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שְׁעָרֶ֗יךָ <WH8179> thee in all thy gates עַ֣ד <WH5704> until רֶ֤דֶת <WH3381> come down חֹמֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH2346> walls הַגְּבֹה֣וֹת <WH1364> until thy high וְהַבְּצֻר֔וֹת <WH1219> and fenced אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you בֹּטֵ֥חַ <WH982> thou trustedst בָּהֵ֖ן בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> throughout all thy land וְהֵצַ֤ר <WH6887> and he shall besiege לְךָ֙ בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> thee in all thy gates בְּכָ֨ל־ <WH3605> throughout אַרְצְךָ֔ <WH776> throughout all thy land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> hath given יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לָֽךְ׃

וְאָכַלְתָּ֣ <WH398> And thou shalt eat פְרִֽי־ <WH6529> the fruit בִטְנְךָ֗ <WH990> of thine own body בְּשַׂ֤ר <WH1320> the flesh בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1121> of thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1323> and of thy daughters אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> hath given לְךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּמָצוֹר֙ <WH4692> thee in the siege וּבְמָצ֔וֹק <WH4689> and in the straitness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָצִ֥יק <WH6693> shall distress לְךָ֖ אֹיְבֶֽךָ׃ <WH341> wherewith thine enemies

הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> [So that] the man הָרַ֣ךְ <WH7390> [that is] tender בְּךָ֔ וְהֶעָנֹ֖ג <WH6028> delicate מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> among you and very תֵּרַ֨ע <WH7489> shall be hostile עֵינ֤וֹ <WH5869> his eye בְאָחִיו֙ <WH251> toward his brother וּבְאֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> and toward the wife חֵיק֔וֹ <WH2436> of his bosom וּבְיֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> and toward the remnant בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> of his children אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יוֹתִֽיר׃ <WH3498> which he shall leave
